Description: CHIRPS v2.0 daily rainfall data for the period 2010-2023 was summed annually, the mean and standard deviation (SD) of this time-series was used to calculate rainfall coefficient of variation  (CV = SD/mean).
Flood hazard maps showing areas inundated during a 20-year return period flood event.
GDO Risk of Drought Impacts for Agriculture (RDrI-Agri) dataset based on remote sensing data from 2010-2024.
Derived from AgERA5, the number of days per month above a critical temperature threshold. We have used a 35° threshold in the interactive tool.
Growing season length in days for baseline and future scenario rcp 2.6.
Baseline water stress from WRI Aqueduct (bwd); categories 2–4 (moderate to extreme) are flagged as hazard presence after resampling to the crop calendar grid and reclassification to binary stress.

Topic: Global Crop Value and Harvested Area
Description: Global spatial production allocation model estimating crop-specific production and harvested area.

Topic: Africa Crop Value and Harvested Area
Description: Africa-specific spatial production allocation model commissioned by the Africa Agricultural Adaptation Atlas.
Rainfed maize crop planting and maturity days, provided as Julian days.
Irrigated maize crop planting and maturity days, provided as Julian days.
Administrative boundaries for aggregation and analysis.
